About Us

Two Lions Contractors, Inc. is co-run by 2 brothers who have been building along with our father since we were young bucks. As military veterans we have the tools and professionalism to help bring all of your remodeling ideas to life.

Our Expertise
  • Decks & Exterior
  • Additions
  • Kitchens & Baths
  • Windows & Doors
  • Basement Living & Rec Rooms
